text: <@U6GNQ7JBU> Thanks! That worked. I guess my issue was misunderstanding the how it was summing the column widths/offsets. I tested it with 3 equal columns with (offset, width) pairs of (0,4) (4,4) (8,4) and it worked as well. Much appreciated!
